title: take a break
body: i noticed that everytime i am deprived of league ( computer issues) and just spend my time watching lcs or just league related videos...when i come back, im significantly better. idk why that is, but i play smarter and build better.... decision making improved by 500%.... on janna , who i usually die 5-6 times a game, i died twice.... and they were from 4 man ganks bot....not my usual bad decision making.... you guys should take a week off of league and just relax :) when u come back, youll see the improvement.
